entry.title: Pure
entry.content:
I took one whole holiday to set up this blog system on github pages. Itâ€™s been near a year since I ungraduated from college and never take a real holiday.

I just work on mobile security research and get intervolution with my fear and anger. Maybe the difference between I and they is that I lack of some pure. Abandoning emotion is too hard for me and they just exceed me with this.

Can it ferment if I keep immersioning in emotion?
